lead_paragraph: Canadian law professor Richard McLaren will deliver his final report into state-sponsored doping in Russian sport on Dec. 9 at a downtown London hotel, the World Anti-Doping Agency said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: McLaren to Deliver Report Into Russian Doping December 9 in London
headline.main: McLaren to Deliver Report Into Russian Doping December 9 in London

snippet: Canadian law professor Richard McLaren will deliver his final report into state-sponsored doping in Russian sport on Dec. 9 at a downtown London hotel, the World Anti-Doping Agency said on Tuesday....
